:py:mod:`model._sklearn_model`
==============================

.. py:module:: model._sklearn_model


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   model._sklearn_model.SklearnModel




.. py:class:: SklearnModel(task, optuna_trial, encoding = None, n_outputs = 1)

   Bases: :py:obj:`model._base_model.BaseModel`, :py:obj:`abc.ABC`

   Parent class based on BaseModel for all models with a sklearn-like API to share functionalities.
   See BaseModel for more information.

   ## Attributes ##
       # Inherited attributes #
       See BaseModel.

   .. py:method:: retrain(self, X_retrain, y_retrain)

      Implementation of the retraining for models with sklearn-like API.
      See BaseModel for more information.


   .. py:method:: predict(self, X_in)

      Implementation of a prediction based on input features for models with sklearn-like API.
      See BaseModel for more information.


   .. py:method:: train_val_loop(self, X_train, y_train, X_val, y_val)

      Implementation of a train and validation loop for models with sklearn-like API.
      See BaseModel for more information.
